text: There Is Such a Lad () is a 1964 Soviet comedy movie directed by Vasily Shukshin.Что не пропустить по ТВ и в Сети на неделе с 6 по 12 июляЖИВЁТ ТАКОЙ ПАРЕНЬ (1964) It stars Leonid Kuravlyov, Lidiya Chaschina, and Larisa Burkova. ==Actors== * Leonid Kuravlyov as Pashka Kolokolnikov * Lidiya Chaschina as Nastya Platonova * Larisa Burkova as Katya Lizunova * Renita Grigoryeva as a city woman * Nina Sazonova as Anisya == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1964 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Vasily Shukshin
title: There Is Such a Lad
